work.name: Institute for Advanced Study, Princeton University
work.position: Graduate Student Researcher in Theoretical Astrophysics
work.summary: Researching various aspects of black holes, including tidal dynamics, parameter estimations of gravitational waves, formal perturbations to general relativity, and more.

publications.name: Parity of polynomial multiplier sequences for the Chebyshev basis
publications.summary: We demonstrate that if p maps to real numbers and is not an even function, then {p(k)} from k = 0 to infinity is not a multiplier sequence for the basis of Chebyshev polynomials of the first kind. We also give a characterization of geometric multiplier sequences for the Chebyshev basis.
